Below is a sample of an op-ed I wrote for this course.

The topic of the op-ed concerns the practice of transferring juvenile offenders to the adult prison system. In this op-ed, I advocate for state-wide reform to the juvenile justice system by raising the age of juvenile court jurisdiction to the age of 18.
